base_description: Beige rectangular stapler, compact and modern.
part_description: Consists of a top arm and base, joined by a hinge. The top arm is elongated and rectangular, while the base is flat and slightly wider. A metal plate and staple compartment are visible inside.
internal_interaction_description: The top arm is pressed down to drive staples through paper, with the hinge allowing movement. The staple compartment holds staples, which are pushed forward by a spring mechanism. The metal plate bends staples into a secure position when pressed.
external_interaction_description: Used to fasten sheets of paper together by pressing down on the top arm. Requires external pressure to operate, typically by hand. Compatible with standard staples, which are loaded into the compartment. Can be placed on desks or held in hand for use.
